column5: Well the day has finally come, after two months of waiting THE OHIO STATE BUCKEYES will play for the national championship against the Florida Gators. I hope the home team wins Should be a good game and I'll probably be late for work tomorrow  Scarlet and Grey all the way!  Whopper
hey whopper florida will hve the game well in hand at the half time.go gators!

Good luck to both teams.  I've enjoyed more ncaa football this past fall/winter than ever before in my life and it's great to see young scholar athletes compete so well and so hard for the love of the game as opposed to the love of money.  Charles
Good luck Phil....I think the Buckeyes will handle them by more then 14 pts.  Have fun! dk

Phil.....Buckeyes all the way Bud! Dont know which hat Im going to wear today........ Either the Ohio State or one of the red ones I picked up at last years Lakair....From you of coarse. Florida has great D.........but the 'eyes have the complete package...specially going 12-0...and with a quarterback as Troy.....Look-out is all I have to say. K.....Hats are settled....the twins will be wearing the red ones from you and I'll be wearing the State hat. Gooooooo...Buckeyes

Hope they win it for you Whopper.   I would have preferred to see them play Michigan again but after their performance in the Rose Bowl, I guess it was the right call picking Florida.  Hopefully the title will at least remain in the Big Ten
sorry Phil, but I am hoping that Ohio State loses & that Boise State is crowned national champions (which wont happen but should  )
